reference.title: javaClass module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements that are necessary to describe an API class.

section.title: Description
section.p: The javaClass topic type contains the elements that are necessary to show the name of the class, the short description of the class, the class syntax, and the class use description. This topic type module also contains all the elements necessary to describe the component fields and methods. The members of the class have the following categories: constants, fields, methods, events, and constructors. To describe the component fields and methods insert the javaField and javaMethod elements into javaClass module.
